member.summary: Executes the procedure

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevProcedureCall.SetWaitForDebugConnection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stops execution on first line of procedure.
member.remarks: This is intended for debugging purposes when you wish to step through a specific procedure call. It only has an effect when a debug server is running and it will only stop once.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevProcedure.CompileUsedProcedures
member.summary: Compile all procedures that are used by the program and that can be compiled with a just-in-time compiler. The method returns true when all used procedures could be compiled by the just-in-time compiler. Procedures that could not be compiled are called normally by the HDevEngine interpreter. To check which procedure could not be compiled and what the reason is for that start HDevelop and check there the compilation states.

member.name: T:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine
member.summary: Executes HDevelop programs and procedures at run time
member.remarks: The hdevenginecpp.dll is required for using this class.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of HDevEngine

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine.IsInitialized
member.summary: Returns true if this class has not yet been disposed

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine.SetEngineAttribute(System.String,HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Changes a global setting of the engine
member.param: The name of the attribute, e.g. "ignore_invalid_lines" or "ignore_unresolved_lines"
The new value of the attribute

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine.GetEngineAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Queries a global setting of the engine
member.param: The name of the attribute, e.g. "ignore_invalid_lines" or "ignore_unresolved_lines"
member.returns: The current value of the attribute

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine.StartDebugServer
member.summary: Starts the debug server that allows to attach HDevelop as as debugger to step through engine code.
member.remarks: With default settings server waits on port 7786 and engine runs normally until HDevelop is connected and F9 is pressed to stop execution.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine.StopDebugServer
member.summary: Stops the debug server (resuming execution if stopped)

member.summary: Sets the path for loading external procedures
member.param: List of directories in the path format of the operating system

member.summary: Appends to the path for loading external procedures
member.param: List of directories in the path format of the operating system

member.summary: Registers your implementation of visualization operators
member.param: An object implementing the IHDevOperators interface

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevEngine.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by this engine

member.name: T:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators
member.summary: Interface for implementation of HDevelop operators
member.remarks: This is intended for use with HDevEngine.SetHDevOperators. Note that two implementations are already provided ready-to-use, namely HDevOpFixedWindowImpl and HDevOpMultiWindowImpl.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevOpenWindow(HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple@)
member.summary: Open a graphics window.
member.param: Row index of upper left corner. Default: 0
Column index of upper left corner. Default: 0
Width of the window. Default: 256
Height of the window. Default: 256
Color of the background of the new window. Default: "black"
Window identifier.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevCloseWindow
member.summary: Close the active graphics window.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetWindow(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Activate a graphics window.
member.param: Window identifier.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevGetWindow(HalconDotNet.HTuple@)
member.summary: Return the identifier of the activate graphics window.
member.param: Window identifier.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetWindowExtents(HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Change position and size of a graphics window.
member.param: Row index of upper left corner. Default: 0
Column index of upper left corner. Default: 0
Width of the window. Default: 256
Height of the window. Default: 256

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetPart(HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Modify the displayed image part.
member.param: Row of the upper left corner of the chosen image part. Default: 0
Column of the upper left corner of the chosen image part. Default: 0
Row of the lower right corner of the chosen image part. Default: 128
Column of the lower right corner of the chosen image part. Default: 128

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevClearWindow
member.summary: Clear the active graphics window.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevDisplay(HalconDotNet.HObject)
member.summary: Displays image objects in the current graphics window.
member.param: Iconic object to be displayed. Attention! This will be disposed automatically by HDevEngine/.NET after DevDisplay returns. Do not keep a reference!

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevDispText(HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple,HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Displays text in the graphics window.
member.param: A tuple of strings containing the text message to be displayed. Each value of the tuple will be displayed in a single line.
If set to 'window', the text position is given with respect to the window coordinate system.If set to 'image', image coordinates are used (this may be useful in zoomed images).
he row coordinate of the desired text position.
The column coordinate of the desired text position.
A tuple of strings defining the colors of the texts.
Generic parameter names.
Generic parameter values.

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetDraw(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Define the region fill mode.
member.param: Fill mode for region output. Default: "fill"

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetShape(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Define the region output shape.
member.param: Region output mode. Default: "original"

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetColored(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Set multiple output colors.
member.param: Number of output colors. Default: 6

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetColor(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Set output color.
member.param: Output color names. Default: "white"

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetLut(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Set "look-up-table" (lut).
member.param: Name of look-up-table, values of look-up-table (RGB) or file name. Default: "default"

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetPaint(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Define the grayvalue output mode.
member.param: Grayvalue output name. Additional parameters possible. Default: "default"

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.IHDevOperators.DevSetLineWidth(HalconDotNet.HTuple)
member.summary: Define the line width for region contour output.
member.param: Line width for region output in contour mode. Default: 1

member.summary: This class wraps an object implementing IHDevOperators, registers internal delegates with the HDevEngine and calls the appropriate interface methods at callback time (including conversion of parameters and transformation of exceptions to return codes).

member.name: M:HalconDotNet.HDevProgram.CompileUsedProcedures
member.summary: Compile all procedures that are used by the program and that can be compiled with a just-in-time compiler. The method returns true when all used procedures could be compiled by the just-in-time compiler. Procedures that could not be compiled are called normally by the HDevEngine interpreter. To check which procedure could not be compiled and what the reason is for that start HDevelop and check there the compilation states.

member.summary: Returns the names of all local procedures
